subject: Public Speaking
title: Greta Thunberg's How Dare You
description: Learn Greta Thunberg's How Dare You in one minute.

hook.text: In 2019, a 16-year-old stared down world leaders at the UN and said: How dare you. The room froze.

buildup.text: Greta Thunberg accused politicians of stealing her generation's future with empty promises and inaction on climate.

discovery.text: Her power came from refusal to perform. No humor, no warmth, no charm â€” just controlled, visible anger.

twist.text: Critics attacked her age. But that was exactly her point: children shouldn't have to fix what adults broke.

climax.text: Thunberg proved that authenticity and fury can be as persuasive as eloquence and polish.

punchline.text: She skipped charm. The world still listened.

quiz.question: What made Greta Thunberg's UN speech unusual in style?
options: It used controlled anger instead of charm or warmth
